global_param.name: UNIQUE_MAILER_INSTANCE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Mailer Plugin]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Select the plugin to activate for concretely sending emails]

global_param.name: FORCE_UNIQUE_FROM
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Unique Sender]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Force all mails to be sent by this Sender email, instead of users adresses]

global_param.name: SUBJECT_PREPEND
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Subject Prepend]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[String automatically added at the beginning of the mail subject]

global_param.name: SUBJECT_APPEND
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Subject Append]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[String automatically added at the end of the mail subject]

global_param.name: BODY_LAYOUT
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Body Layout]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Main Layout for the email body, use HTML for send nice emails, and use the AJXP_MAIL_BODY keyword for the real content.]

global_param.name: LAYOUT_FOLDER
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Layout Folder]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Extract the main layout from a localized file. Will prevail on the previous parameter, make sure to have an AJXP_MAIL_BODY in the layout file.]
